description:
Vertical canyon, has some narrow parts at the start, but opens up for the big vertical part. Towards the end is a cave with waterflow that has been partially explored.

The canyon is below a southfacing glacier, it has happened before that the flow went from a few litres per second to more that a cubic meter. It's not easy to find the right flow for this one.
